title: George Crowther (footballer)
text:
George Lisle Crowther (18 April 1892 – 1957) was an English professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> who played in the <a href="Football%20League">Football League</a> for <a href="Hartlepools%20United%20F.C.">Hartlepools United</a>, <a href="Tranmere%20Rovers%20F.C.">Tranmere Rovers</a>, <a href="Bradford%20Park%20Avenue%20A.F.C.">Bradford Park Avenue</a>, <a href="West%20Ham%20United%20F.C.">West Ham United</a> and <a href="Huddersfield%20Town%20A.F.C.">Huddersfield Town</a>.
Personal life.
Crowther served as a <a href="Private%20%28rank%29">private</a> in the <a href="Football%20Battalion">17th (Service) Battalion</a> of the <a href="Middlesex%20Regiment">Middlesex Regiment</a> during the <a href="First%20World%20War">First World War</a>.
